DOC.HEADLINE: COUNTYWIDE FOCUS : EDITOR TO DISCUSS REBELLION IN MEXICO
DOC.TEXT: Sergio Munoz , editor of Nuestro Tiempo , the weekly Spanish-language publication of the Los Angeles Times , is scheduled to discuss the Mexican rebellion at the Spanish Hills Country_Club in Camarillo at 6 p.m. Thursday . Munoz will discuss the Mexican state of Chiapas , where recent guerrilla movements have taken_place . He will also discuss the relationship of the North_American Free_Trade Agreement to the revolt and the upcoming Mexican presidential election . Munoz , who has traveled extensively in Chiapas , is also a writer for such publications as New Perspectives Quarterly and Jueves de Excelsior in Mexico_City . Those interested in attending the event , sponsored by the World Affairs Council of Ventura County , should make reservations by calling 648-1882 . CHRISTINA LIMA
